title: Legs, leglessness, and locomotion
creator_credit: Kinatura Films, Bank of New South Wales and David Stammer
brief_description: Closely looks at aspects of legs, leglessness and locomotion in Monitor Lizards, and confirms the widely held belief that snakes share their ancestry. Also suggests the probability that all snakes once possessed legs.
creator_credit_for_label: Kinatura Films, Bank of New South Wales and David Stammer
